item.title: CVE-2023-1390|2023-04-20T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- linux%20kernel%20%28tipc%20kernel%20module%29
item.description: A remote denial of service vulnerability was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s TIPC kernel module. The while loop in tipc_link_xmit() hits an unknown state while attempting to parse SKBs, which are not in the queue. Sending two small UDP packets to a system with a UDP bearer results in the CPU utilization for the system to instantly spike to 100%, causing a denial of service condition.
